channel.title: Client picture help?!?!
channel.description: so ive been serching but i still cant figure ity out.. i have a 317 and i need to know how to change my client picture like the picture u see when your loging in. pleas help

item.title: Client picture help?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:4, topic:362509”]the client background picture is usually in the sprits/sprites files
once you find it, get a picture that you like, and delete the current background it has
and replace it with the picture you like
make sure that the two pictures have the same name E.G:
Client_title1.
then compile…it should work then[/quote]
If it is not in the Sprites folder, it is probobly in the cache. You can edit the cache with Tom’s Cache Suite.

Read full topic

item.title: Client picture help?!?!
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

the client background picture is usually in the sprits/sprites files
once you find it, get a picture that you like, and delete the current background it has
and replace it with the picture you like
make sure that the two pictures have the same name E.G:
Client_title1.
then compile…it should work then
